tech.mcprison.prison.internal

Interface Scheduler


  • public interface Scheduler
    Allows tasks to be scheduled to run later or at intervals, on the server thread or on its own thread.
    Since:
    API 1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancelAll()
      Cancels all tasks registered through this scheduler.
      void cancelTask(int taskId)
      Cancel a certain task.
      int runTaskLater(java.lang.Runnable run, long delay)
      Run a task on the server thread, after a certain amount of time.
      int runTaskLaterAsync(java.lang.Runnable run, long delay)
      Run a task on its own thread, after a certain amount of time.
      int runTaskTimer(java.lang.Runnable run, long delay, long interval)
      Run a task on the server thread, at the specified interval.
      int runTaskTimerAsync(java.lang.Runnable run, long delay, long interval)
      Run a task on its own thread, at the specified interval.

    • Method Detail

      • runTaskLater

        int runTaskLater(java.lang.Runnable run,
                 long delay)
        Run a task on the server thread, after a certain amount of time.
        Parameters:
        run - The Runnable with the task inside.
        delay - The time to wait, in ticks, until the task is run.
        Returns:
        The task ID.

      • runTaskLaterAsync

        int runTaskLaterAsync(java.lang.Runnable run,
                      long delay)
        Run a task on its own thread, after a certain amount of time.
        Parameters:
        run - The Runnable with the task inside.
        delay - The time to wait, in ticks, until the task is run.
        Returns:
        The task ID.

      • runTaskTimer

        int runTaskTimer(java.lang.Runnable run,
                 long delay,
                 long interval)
        Run a task on the server thread, at the specified interval.
        Parameters:
        run - The Runnable with the task inside.
        delay - The time to wait, in ticks, until the timer is started.
        interval - The time between runs, in ticks.
        Returns:
        The task ID.

      • runTaskTimerAsync

        int runTaskTimerAsync(java.lang.Runnable run,
                      long delay,
                      long interval)
        Run a task on its own thread, at the specified interval.
        Parameters:
        run - The Runnable with the task inside.
        delay - The time to wait, in ticks, until the timer is started.
        interval - The time between runs, in ticks.
        Returns:
        The task ID.

      • cancelTask

        void cancelTask(int taskId)
        Cancel a certain task.
        Parameters:
        taskId - The task's ID.

      • cancelAll

        void cancelAll()
        Cancels all tasks registered through this scheduler.
